subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Tuscaloosa County jail records show that Alabama running back Kenyan Drake was arrested and was being held on $1,000 bond on a misdemeanor charge of obstructing government operations.
snippet: Tuscaloosa County jail records show that Alabama running back Kenyan Drake was arrested and was being held on $1,000 bond on a misdemeanor charge of obstructing government operations.
